H0.text: Crust is the section of Earth that is composed primarily of liquid metal.

H1.text: The mantle is the section of Earth composed primarily of liquid metal.

H2.text: The outer core is the section of Earth composed primarily of liquid metal.

H3.text: The inner core is the section of Earth composed primarily of liquid metal.

A4.text: The outer core of Earth is liquid, unlike its inner core, which is solid.
